Sentencas: A 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor (MIEC) as electrolyte is developed, considering the mass transport, electrochemical reaction and charge transport.
Titulo: 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor as electrolyte

Sentencas: The electrochemical reaction is described by the Butler-Volmer equation and the expression of the oxygen partial pressure at the reaction interface is obtained by the energy conservation analysis.
Titulo: 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor as electrolyte

Sentencas: The model results are compared with experimental data and good agreement is achieved.
Titulo: 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor as electrolyte

Sentencas: The characteristics of the SOFC with a samaria doped ceria (SDC) electrolyte are analyzed by this model.
Titulo: 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor as electrolyte

Sentencas: Parametric simulations are conducted to investigate the uniformity of the leakage current (electronic current) and oxygen partial pressure in the electrolyte under various operating conditions.
Titulo: 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor as electrolyte

Sentencas: The results provide fundamental information on the leakage current in a SOFC and can serve as a useful tool for design optimization.
Titulo: 2D segment model for a solid oxide fuel cell with a mixed ionic and electronic conductor as electrolyte
